typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Category as string,
		Mainkey as string,
		Subkey as string,
		Data as string,
		Data_Desc as string,
		Param as string,
		Param_Desc as string,
		Type as string,
		Reference as string,
		Application as string,
		UpdateTime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select * from MasterSurvey',
	format: 'query') ~> SourceSurvey
